header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Clause 1, page 1, line 3, leave out “pornographic images” and insert “adult content”
000: Clause 1, page 1, line 7, leave out “pornographic images” and insert “adult content”
000: Clause 1, page 1, line 11, leave out “pornographic images” and insert “adult content”
000: Clause 1, page 1, line 17, leave out “pornographic images” and insert “adult content”
000: Clause 1, page 1, line 17, at end insert—
““adult content” means an internet access service that contains harmful and offensive materials from which persons under the age of eighteen are protected;
“harmful and offensive materials” has the same meaning as in section 3 of the Communications Act 2003;
“material from which persons under the age of eighteen are protected” means material specified in the OFCOM standards under section 319(2)(a) of the Communications Act 2003.”
000: Clause 2, page 1, line 20, after “content” insert “at an age appropriate level”
000: Clause 5, page 2, leave out lines 17 and 18
